messages.title: IMPROVING OUR HIGH STREETS
messages.content: Working closely with stakeholders in Mid Suffolk and Bury sectors on how to improve and enhance our offer on our high streets.

messages.title: BETTER ROADS & RAIL FOR SUFFOLK
messages.content: Transport links are vital to businesses and residents in our area. That is why I have been working to ensure we have the robust infrastructure we deserve.

messages.title: DRIVING MONEY INTO LOCAL SERVICES
messages.content: Championing investment in our local hospital, schools and police - services I know matter most to us and our family.

messages.title: SUPPORTING THE CAUSES YOU CARE ABOUT
messages.content: An important part of being your MP is ensuring that I help local individuals and groups with issues and causes that matter.

messages.title: BREXIT: 'JUST GET IT DONE'
messages.content: When I came out and about in the constituency, the one phrase I heard loud and clear was 'just get Brexit done'.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supporting the ambitious vision for the town's future; commitment to thriving market towns, ensuring an exciting mix of entertainment, events, and cultural offerings.
Secured funding for the A14 success; campaigning for better rail access including Stowmarket station access for all and funding for smaller transport projects.
Secured £13.4 million of funding awarded to the constituency to improve the area; enhancing local services like schools and police with significant investments.
Ensured an additional £200,000 funding investment in West Suffolk Hospital; fighting to reduce closing times and increasing front-line staffing.
Focused on delivering Brexit; determined to resolve the situation and not waste £174 million on elections while it remains unresolved.

issues.brexitEurope: 'Just get Brexit done' - emphasis on resolving Brexit efficiently to avoid wasting funds on elections.
issues.education: Highlighting investment and improvements in local schools.
issues.health: Additional £200,000 funding for West Suffolk Hospital; committed to improving health services.

contactInformation.address: 10 Hatter Street, Bury St Edmunds, Suffolk, IP33 1LZ
